Big thanks to the uploader for this file.

Classification: Documentary
Genre: Wildlife
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 11, 2013

Penguin Spy in the Huddle is a wildlife series narrated by David Tennant. The series focuses on the lives of penguins. Cameras record penguins as they have never been seen before. From the freezing Antarctic to the scorching tropics, 50 spy cameras film unique footage of this extraordinary species.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34358)
